content.rendered:
Directed by Hitesh Kewalya

Written by Hitesh Kewalya

Cast Ayushmann Khurrana (Kartik Singh). Jitendra Kumar (Aman Tripathi). Gajraj Rao (Shankar Tripathi). Neena Gupta (Sunaina Tripathi). Manu Rishi Chadha (Chaman Tripathi). Sunita Rajwar (Champa Tripathi). Maanvi Gagroo (Goggle Tripathi). Pankhuri Awasthi (Kusum (as Pankhuri Awasthy)). Neeraj Singh (Keshav). Gopal Datt (Doctor (as Gopal Dutt)). Haardik Gabbi (Pintu). Naval Shukla (Kusum’s Father). Anju Tiwari (Kusum’s Mother). Bhumi Pednekar (Devika). Mahesh Sethi (Devika’s Father). Sobbie Bawa (Krishna (voice)). Alok Shankar Bhatt (Tc1). Biswajit (Ghodiwala 1). Satish Brahmbhatt (Raghav). Yashvardhan Dubey (Train Sweeper Boy). Archana Gupta (Mother At Station). Gopal Gurjar (Old Man On Terrace). Himanshaurya (Young Aman). Yasin Khan (Goggle Sasuraal Uncle 1). Anushree Kushwaha (Tv News Reporter). Divyansh Mishra (Young Kartik). Ajit Singh Palawat (Police inspector). Brij Kumar Pandey (Pandit). Tilak Raj (Father At Station). Rahul Shanklya (Goggle Sasuraal Uncle 2). Shivam Singh (Ghodiwala 2). Dhairya Tiwari (Kid At Station).

Languages Hindi

Producers Arif Ahmed. Karuna Badwal. Manish Bharati. Kanupriya. Hetvi Karia. Bhushan Kumar. Divya Khosla Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Aanand L. Rai. Himanshu Sharma. Shashikant Sinha. Vishal Vats.

Production Colour Yellow Productions. T-Series Films.
